Coroner releases video of Auckland man being Tasered during arrest, police CPR attempts before death in custody https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-releases-video-of-auckland-man-being-tasered-during-arrest-police-cpr-attempts-before-death-in-custody/25OLFY6UYJCQ7PEALU5K3INXMU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-releases-video-of-auckland-man-being-tasered-during-arrest-police-cpr-attempts-before-death-in-custody/25OLFY6UYJCQ7PEALU5K3INXMU/ Lane NicholsThe video shows the man attacking a pensioner before he is Tasered by police and arrested. Mon, 01 Jul 2024 02:28:18 +0000 Video footage shows police Tasering Alo Ngata after he attacked a pensioner in Freemans Bay in July 2018. Ngata was arrested and died in hospital three days later.

Mon, 01 Jul 2024 02:00:00 +0000 An elderly man died shortly after he was discharged from Taranaki Base Hospital with no proper care plan in place.
